ComicInfo.Summary: As Sonja and her pirate allies sail home, they discover that Kulan Gath has captured the Goddess and taken over the world. Sonja meets with a ragtag band of rebels hiding out but, before she can rally them to fight against Gath, she has to face her darkest fears in a mystic tree. She gets a little help from the ghost of Suumaro.
ComicInfo.Tags: Scathach,Red Sonja,The Long Way Back Home,Valera,Kulan Gath,Osin,Suumaro,Caska
ComicInfo.Title: The Long Way Home Part 4
ComicInfo.Writer: Brian Reed,Michael Avon Oeming,Michael Avon Oeming,Brian Reed
